snippet: Malcolm Brogdon scored 17 points as No. 3 Virginia’s defense bore down in the second half of a 75-64 road victory over No. 12 North Carolina.
abstract: University of Virginia defeats University of North Carolina, 75-64; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Malcolm Brogdon scored 17 points as No. 3 Virginia’s defense bore down in the second half of a 75-64 road victory over No. 12 North Carolina.

headline.print_headline: Virginia Earns a Win at North Carolina
